questions.quote: Remember when we were standing there and she mentioned it? I made a mental note of it.

Oh yeah, all the time, all the time...although, recently I've been thinking about this friend of mine.

I have an idea.  We can make the nine-thirty at Cinema Three.
Why should we let petty, personal differences get in the way of business? I, uh, I want you to come back.  You can use my bathroom anytime you want.
First of all, I don't think you can make a rooster take a dive.
You really do the worst Godfather I ever heard. You're not even close.

Blow out the candles! Blow out the candles, I said! Blow out the damn candles!
